definition: row/line/commercial firm/line of business/profession/to rank (first, second etc) among one's siblings (by age)/(in data tables) row/(Tw) column

to walk/to go/to travel/a visit/temporary/makeshift/current/in circulation/to do/to perform/capable/competent/effective/all right/OK!/will do/behavior/conduct/Taiwan pr. [xing4] for the behavior-conduct sense
to have/there is/there are/to exist/to be

sentences.english: Things that actually work, good stuff.
Road-toll is an efficient way to collect capital for road building.
sentences.chinese: 公路收費是籌集公路建設資金的一種行之有效的方法。

sentences.english: But supporters of Herbology believe it works.
sentences.chinese: 但是支持者認爲草藥學是行之有效的。

sentences.english: The practice has shown that the monitoring system is effectual.
sentences.chinese: 實踐表明，該監督控制系統是行之有效的。

sentences.english: Changing fine penalty into other penalty is a effective way in practice.
sentences.chinese: 罰金的易科執行經實踐是行之有效的方法。

sentences.english: And hydrogen production through anaerobic fermentation is the most feasible way.
sentences.chinese: 厭氧發酵法制氫是目前其中最行之有效的方法之一。

sentences.english: It is effective to draw the abnormal class section.
sentences.chinese: 編制異常等級斷面圖就是一種行之有效的方法。

sentences.english: It is an easy and effective method to apply EET theory to the calculation of interphase boundary energy.
sentences.chinese: 運用EET理論計算界面能是簡便且行之有效的方法。

sentences.english: Experiment proves this formular is feasible.
sentences.chinese: 實踐證明，該公式是行之有效的。

sentences.english: Examples show that the algorithm is valid.
sentences.chinese: 實例表明此完備化方法是行之有效的。

sentences.english: Certifiably, vacuum preloading is an effective technology for consolidating silt foundation.
sentences.chinese: 證明採用真空預壓法加固淤泥地基是行之有效的方法。

sentences.english: Chinese English education policies are in conformity with its national conditions and have been proved to be workable in practice.
sentences.chinese: 中國英語教育政策符合國情，實踐證明是行之有效的。

sentences.english: Thought the WKB method is one effective method.
sentences.chinese: 認爲WKB法是一種行之有效的方法。

sentences.english: One of the easiest and most dependable ways to get her in the mood is to place your mouth on the back of her neck.
sentences.chinese: 最簡單而又行之有效的一個方法就是吻她的後頸。

sentences.english: The results suggest that operation is the most effective method for treating cardiac myxomas.
sentences.chinese: 提示手術切除是治療心臟黏液瘤行之有效的方法。

sentences.english: It worked for me, at least.
sentences.chinese: 這對我來說是行之有效，至少。

definition: practice/to put into practice/to live up to (a promise)/to carry out (a project)
countermeasure for dealing with a situation
to adopt or carry out (measures, policies, course of action)/to take
(of systems, facilities etc) comprehensive/well-developed/excellent/to refine/to improve
